document.full_text: marion bartoli was a major doubt for the french open after a possible thigh injury forced her to retire from the final of the strasbourg international tennis against german andrea petkovic saturday.
document.title: bartoli is a major doubt for french open
lines_and_colors: marion bartoli was a major doubt for the french open after a possible thigh injury forced her to retire from the final of the strasbourg international tennis against german andrea petkovic saturday.
